title: Patch 6.1 FPS drop
body:
Since patch 6.1, myself and my room mate have been receiving non stop fps drops. I have tried everything to minimise this new issue.

I did some googling and found some people from NA, EU that have the same issue since this patch. I am not sure if it is everyone being effected or just a few but I think I have narrowed it down to being a bug with the 6.1 patch. Many people have been discussing in other regions how there computer system is running perfectly fine and cannot seem to stop the fps drop.

Please help resolve this issue riot. Thanks

replies.body:
I am having the same issue, seems like it is riot's end.
similar post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/42frjc/anyone_else_having_strange_fps_drops_since_the/
